assocPolicies.name: Policy Name
assocPolicies.authTip: If you need to cancel the "Application Default Authorization" policy, please go to 「Access Policies」-「Default Permission Policies」to disable it. To cancel the associated authorization for a department or group, go to 「Organization」-「Department」or「Group」-「Authorization Policies」to perform the operation. "Initial Activation Authorization" does not support cancellation.
